00027 #include "kvi_settings.h"
00028 #include "KviQString.h"
00029 #include "KviKvsVariant.h"
00030 
00031 #include "KviPointerHashTable.h"
00032 #include "KviPointerHashTable.h"
00033 
00034 class KVIRC_API KviKvsSwitchList
00035 {
00036 public:
00037         KviKvsSwitchList();
00038         ~KviKvsSwitchList();
00039 protected:
00040         KviPointerHashTable<unsigned short,KviKvsVariant> * m_pShortSwitchDict;
00041         KviPointerHashTable<QString,KviKvsVariant>    * m_pLongSwitchDict;
00042 public:
00043         void clear();
00044         void addShort(unsigned short uShortKey,KviKvsVariant * pVariant);
00045         void addLong(const QString &szLongKey,KviKvsVariant * pVariant);
00046 
00047         bool isEmpty(){ return ((m_pShortSwitchDict == 0) && (m_pLongSwitchDict == 0)); };
00048 
00049         KviKvsVariant * find(const QChar &c)
00050         {
00051                 return m_pShortSwitchDict ? m_pShortSwitchDict->find(c.unicode()) : 0;
00052         };
00053 
00054         KviKvsVariant * find(unsigned short uShortKey)
00055         {
00056                 return m_pShortSwitchDict ? m_pShortSwitchDict->find((int)uShortKey) : 0;
00057         };
00058 
00059         KviKvsVariant * find(const QString &szLongKey)
00060         {
00061                 return m_pLongSwitchDict ? m_pLongSwitchDict->find(szLongKey) : 0;
00062         };
00063 
00064         KviKvsVariant * find(unsigned short uShortKey,const QString &szLongKey)
00065         {
00066                 if(m_pLongSwitchDict)
00067                 {
00068                         KviKvsVariant * t;
00069                         t = m_pLongSwitchDict->find(szLongKey);
00070                         if(t)return t;
00071                 }
00072                 return m_pShortSwitchDict ? m_pShortSwitchDict->find((int)uShortKey) : 0;
00073         };
00074 
00075         bool getAsStringIfExisting(unsigned short uShortKey,const QString &szLongKey,QString &szBuffer)
00076         {
00077                 KviKvsVariant * v = find(uShortKey,szLongKey);
00078                 if(v)
00079                 {
00080                         v->asString(szBuffer);
00081                         return true;
00082                 }
00083                 return false;
00084         };
00085 };
00086 
00087 #endif //!_KVI_KVS_SWITCHLIST_H_
